author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA NOW A REMNANT LOW... ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES CONTINUES FOR ANOTHER DAY OR TWO...
summary: ...PRISCILLA NOW A REMNANT LOW... ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES CONTINUES FOR ANOTHER DAY OR TWO... As of 2:00 PM PDT Fri Oct 10 the center of Priscilla was located near 26.3, -115.4 with movement N at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...PRISCILLA NOW A REMNANT LOW... ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES CONTINUES FOR ANOTHER DAY OR TWO... title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
